parameters.name: videos.privacy.add
parameters.description:
boolean No

Sets the default add setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. If true, anyone can add the video to an album, channel, or group.

parameters.name: videos.privacy.comments
parameters.description:
string anybody
contacts
nobody
No

Sets the default comment setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. It specifies who can comment on the video.

parameters.name: videos.privacy.download
parameters.description:
boolean No

Sets the default download setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. If true, the video can be downloaded by any user.

parameters.name: videos.privacy.embed
parameters.description:
string private
public
whitelist
No

Sets the default embed setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. Whitelist allows you to define all valid embed domains. Check out our docs for adding and removing domains.

parameters.name: videos.privacy.view
parameters.description:
string anybody
contacts
disable
nobody
password
unlisted
users
No

Sets the default view setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. It specifies who can view the video.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
string viewable
No

Filter to apply to the results.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
string date
default
manual
name
purchase_time
release_date
No

Technique used to sort the results.

parameters.name: access_type
parameters.description:
string default
vip
No

Promotion access type a purchase option that is not available on the container. "vip" promotions will always make the content free, and must be further defined with the download or stream_period fields.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description:
string Yes

If you are only creating a single promotion code, you can provide the value here. This field will be rejected for batch promotions.

parameters.name: discount_type
parameters.description:
string free
percent
No

Describes the type of discount offered by this promo code. Note: When providing an access type of "vip", this field only accepts the "free" discount type.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description:
boolean Yes

Whether this promotion grants download access to vod content. This is only necessary when not defined on the On Demand Container, and creating promotions with the "vip" access type and "buy" product type

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description:
timestamp No

The latest time this promotion is valid. If end_time is not specified, the promotion will never expire.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description:
string Yes

If you are creating a batch promotion, you can describe it here. This field will be rejected for single promotions.

parameters.name: percent_off
parameters.description:
integer Yes

The percentage saved by using this promo code. This field is required, and only applicable if the field discount_type is set to percent.

parameters.name: product_type
parameters.description:
string any
buy
buy_episode
rent
rent_episode
subscribe
No

Restricts the promotion to a particular type of transaction. Defaults to "any" when access type is "default", and to "rent" if the access type is "vip". Only "buy" and "rent" are valid if the access_type is "vip".

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description:
timestamp No

The earliest time this promotion is valid. If start_time is not specified, it will default to the time the promotion was created.

parameters.name: stream_period
parameters.description:
string 1_week
1_year
24_hour
30_day
3_month
48_hour
6_month
72_hour
Yes

The amount of time a user will have access to the vod content upon redeeming a promo code. This is only necessary when not defined on the On Demand Container, and creating promotions with the "vip" access type and "rent" product type.

parameters.name: total
parameters.description:
integer Yes

Number of promotions to generate if type is batch. The amount of uses for the promotion if type is single.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
string batch
single
Yes

Type of promotions to use. If the access type is "vip", the only possible value for this field is batch.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
string batch
default
single
vip
No

Filter to apply to the results.

A list of values describing the content in this video. You can find the full list in the /contentrating endpoint. You must provide a list representation appropriate for your request body (comma separated for querystring, or array for JSON).

parameters.name: spatial.director_timeline
parameters.description:
array No

360 director timeline. The arrays in this should include a "time_code", "pitch", "yaw", and optionally "roll". For pitch, the minimum allowed is -90, and the max of 90. For yaw, the minimum is 0, and a maximum of 360.

parameters.name: spatial.field_of_view
parameters.description:
integer No
